metadata.title: CVE-2020-21913 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
International Components for Unicode (ICU-20850) v66.1 was discovered to contain a use after free bug in the pkg_createWithAssemblyCode function in the file tools/pkgdata/pkgdata.cpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-21913` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu67 - 67.1-7ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> firefox, thunderbird, mozjs don't build pkgdata.cpp

criterions.comment: icu package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '67.1-7ubuntu1').
